TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition
Public NotInheritable Class GacMembershipCondition Implements IMembershipCondition
type GacMembershipCondition = class interface IMembershipCondition interface ISecurityEncodable interface ISecurityPolicyEncodable

summary.span: 藉由測試組件的全域組件快取成員資格，決定組件是否屬於程式碼群組。

span.span: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its global assembly cache membership.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授與所有組件安裝在全域組件快取`FullTrust`權限集合。All assemblies installed in the global assembly cache are granted the `FullTrust` permission set. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 原則層級內容供解析具名使用權限集合參考。The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references. 比方說，程式碼群組會使用原則層級，若要尋找具名使用權限集合。For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
